sheet.name: en
sheet.text: Though it doesn't feel exactly right for me to say that...
Why? That's a perfectly normal thing to say when you meet someone.
Anyway, I'm Ally! What's your name, stranger?
I'm the incarnation of the Will of the Worlds.
Or at least, just a part of it.
For a very long time, longer than you can imagine...
I've been looking after you, keeping you safe... ♪
I-I'm sorry. I'm having a hard time understanding all this.
It's all right, I don't blame you. It's a lot to take in at once.
I just wanted you to know how thrilled I am to finally meet you.
Listen, Ally. Can I ask you for a huge favor?
Please, go help Arle and the others.
Arle... Why does that name sound so familiar?
This feeling... I can't explain it.
I feel so... full... of... LOOOOOOOOVE!
Your powers are needed more than ever.
You'll have to use them in the fight against Squares.
I hear you loud and clear!
...You've made up your mind? You're going to help me?
I can sense the love deep within your heart!
You're trying to save someone! You want to protect them!
I can sense it from a mile away! You're practically bursting with love!
This "Arle" person? I feel like... I don't know, like I owe them something.
Now, what do I do with all this love? I can't just leave it trapped inside me. It has to be free!
Your powers... Share them with me.
But first, you must overcome this trial!
My heart's still brimming with love!
Our next destination is a bit out of the ordinary.
Uh, I wouldn't exactly call the last place we went ordinary.
Well, this one will be even more out of the ordinary! Maybe even extraordinary! ♪
The sky... There are stars as far as the eye can see. It's beautiful.
And all those shapes scattered everywhere—I've never seen anything like them.
This is starting to get really fun! Don't you think, Marle?
Did I say something wrong, Marle?
N-No, not at all. You just... You said you're having "fun," right?
Well, then... Good. I-I'm glad to hear it.
Here. Try using your powers in this spot.
This well of love never runs dry!
In that case, I'm counting on you!
I could do this all day!
Now where to next? I've got lots more love to spread!
Um, are you all right, Marle?
Hey, don't ignore me! Why are you making that face?
I've never seen anyone with such pure, untainted love. It's almost too much for me!
Heeey, this place looks pretty fun, too!
You know, Marle, I don't know exactly what it is you're going through.
But what I DO know is that there's someone you love with all your heart!
From the moment I met you, I could sense you were thinking about someone important.
I also sensed that you're willing to do anything to help them.
And you know what that is? LOVE! And what's better than love? MORE LOVE!
That's exactly why I'm going to help your friend Arle!
There's enough love to go around for everyone!
I don't know what to say...
Just promise you'll be rooting for me!
Thank you, Ally. That about does it.
What about us? Are we splitting up!?
You've done so much for me already. I don't want to trouble you any further.
It was no trouble at all! Really!
I appreciate you saying that, but it was selfish of me to ask you to do so much.
It's a terrible habit of mine. I'm so sorry...
*sad groan* Why am I like this...?
I know what'll cheer you up, Marle!
Let's express our love for each other!
But I know something's bothering you.
Every so often, I catch a glint of sadness in your eyes.
RIGHT! And there's no better way to fight sadness than by showing each other LOVE!
Because when you love someone, you trust them! And trust is something really special.
I helped you because I trust you, Marle.
And I'm so grateful you did!
Do you think you could find it in your heart to trust me, too?
It'd make me feel a lot better to know we both trust each other.
And double the trust means double the joy!
You never know until you try, right?
Now, let's battle in the name of love!
So? How do you feel now, Marle?
I feel so... so warm inside.
Cherish and nurture that love inside you.
Use that love to share my powers with the one in your heart!
When you find them, be sure to express your love to them and—
I-I can't do that! That's far too embarrassing!
But I will use the incredible powers you gave me.
I'm sorry, I can't say for certain...
But I CAN promise you one thing—I'll always watch over you!
Most of my powers—including the ones I gathered—are gone.
I'll give it to you straight.
There's no shortcut to gaining the power to defeat Squares.
It's not something that can be done overnight.
What!? Then what do we do?
Someone who holds the key—or rather, IS the key—to fixing it all.
Of course. Don't you realize what you're capable of?
You and Squares have watched over this dimension for a very, very long time, Marle.
You possess incredible powers that may be able to help you.
But perhaps recent events have affected your memory...
Then your best bet is to remember... well, everything.
Only then will you be prepared to face Squares.
Sounds more like speculation than fact to me.
What does matter is that you help Marle however you can.
Besides, it'll serve as excellent training for all of you.
Yeah, you can be a real pain...
So there's really no other way?
That's right. As I see it—
You may as well save us time and just warp us there.
You know, to the special training zone you created for us.
H-How do you know about that!?
You're the master of preparation. I had a feeling you'd do something like this.
You left hints there for us, too, didn't you?
Wh-What!? How do you know all this!?
Let's expedite the process, shall we?
I guess this is the place...
Let's take a look at these hints. First one says...
"A cute mascot battle will soothe your soul. ♪"
Should we come back later or something?
There must be more to this hint.
Yeah, let's see if we can figure this out.
The only "cute mascots" I can think of are...
I believe we're on the same page...
Did that battle make you feel funny or something?
I just can't help but wonder about this power.
Does it really exist somewhere inside me?
Squares was able to manipulate me so easily.
Even if I do rediscover my powers, what if they're worthless?
The first step to making this all happen is to believe!
Moping around won't get us anywhere. Heck, it makes the possible impossible!
So for starters, let's turn that frown upside down!
Let's try a smile! A fun smile!
She's not literally killing... Ah, forget it.
C'mon, let's see what the next hint says!
Well... there IS one person who may be the answer to our problems.
You also received power from that girl in the book, didn't you?
"Lift your spirits with a battle of friendship. Smile with your friends."
Soooo, we just need to have a friendly battle?
Well, Ringo and Arle have been best friends since forever.
Then they should be the ones battling, not us!
But... I wanna be better friends with you, Ess!
I'd be thrilled if we could just have one itty bitty little battle!
I bet Marle would be happy, too!
You don't know what you're missing~!
One more word and I'll make this punishment a hundred times worse!
Look at you two. Practically best friends already.
*chuckle* Glad to see you're making friends, Ess.
That was very heartwarming to watch. ♪
Ugh! How did I ever get stuck with these idiots!?
Come on already! What's the next one say!?
I hope I didn't seem distracted.
Forgive me if I'm being presumptuous.
But you look a little nervous.
Is it Squares? Is he really that powerful?
I see a bit of myself in Squares. My former self, that is.
I can't even look at him sometimes.
Wandering about, acting like a petulant child...
That's a bad habit. You need to work on it.
The key to stopping yourself from overthinking...
You were right. My mind was completely focused on our battle.
And as a result, I'm thinking a lot more clearly now.
*chuckle* I just don't want you fretting over our target. That's all.
Perhaps I was the one acting like a child. I'll try not to make a fuss again.
"Thrills! Suspense! A battle between serious rivals!"
What are you talking about, Schezo?
It simply MUST be talking about us.
You and I are bound and gagged together!
Guh! That was a bad one, wasn't it!?
O-Of course I meant, "You and I are bound by rivalry and gagged by strife!"
But the words "serious" and "Schezo" just don't go together.
Don't you worry! Leave it to me!
We've got a star actor among us who can be your rival!
What kinda third-rate acting is this!?
"You took the words right out of my mouth, Maguro."
"Disgusting doesn't even begin to describe what you've done."
Seems like they have quite the history...
"Like that time you overwatered my cactus and nearly killed it..."
"Or that time you fed my cat too much rice and made him fat."
*gulping at the edge of her seat*
...Suspenseful for ya, huh? Well, if it works, it works!
"I can say the same about you!"
"How dare you beat my grandma so badly in checkers!"
"She was shaken up so hard that all she ate for weeks was half a mandarin orange!"
"You tried to peek inside Ris, didn't you!?"
It appears I've suddenly become a plot point in this performance.
"Enough is enough! We settle this with a battle! En garde!"
"Heh... You put up quite a fight, Ringo."
"But I expected nothing less from you."
Their rivalry is so fierce... I'm breathless!
And they end up fighting each other... I feel like...
Phew! That was fun, wasn't it, Maguro?
Maybe for you, Ringo. I think I got stage fright... ★
Well, I'd say we did pretty good for what it was!
Something feels off, doesn't it, Elle?
Everyone's super focused on something big...
Wait! Don't you see? Now's our chance! ♪
Yeah! Now's our chance to set traps all over the place...
What are you two talking about?
However, Tee and Ex warned me about you two.
They expected you would be bored and would be up to no good.
I was asked to monitor the two of you.
What seems to be the problem?
They know everything! That's the problem!
I am sorry, but I do not understand.
If you're really REALLY sorry, then play with us!
I know! Let's do the one where everyone fights together!
Right! The one where everyone uses their skills!
We've been dying to try it!
If I agree, you must promise to behave yourselves.
Zeeeeeed! Play with us some more!
Th-This is not what we agreed upon!
The Will of the Worlds never had a physical form.
It was a shock unlike any other...
We didn't want to raise your suspicion, of course.
Let us know if you remember anything, Marle!
"Lovey! Dovey! Mushy! Gushy! A battle of passion!"
A battle of passion!? That's, that's, that's...
Someone's getting worked up about this, isn't she?
You seem awfully calm about it, Ringo.
Well, yeah. It's a battle about love. What else could it mean?
And get back to work, Ecolo!
In case you didn't notice, we're too busy for your nonsense!
Careful, you two. These ladies can sense your fear.
Well, if the Dark Prince can't be here, then there's no point in me being here, either.
Rulue's out of the picture, then...
I bet I know where your mind was going...
Besides, I wouldn't DREAM of burdening Lemres right now.
Lemres, huh? Who said anything about Lemres?
So do we really not have a good pair for this battle?
Do you two have something in mind?
Well, if we're talking about love and mushy stuff, what better than a pair of adorable twins...
You're just coming up with excuses to torture Ai again, aren't you?
Heh... I suppose you could say I'm used to it now.
Like they say, "If you can't beat them, curl up in a ball and protect your organs."
It's 'cause we give him so much love! ♪
Looks like your days of cowardly retreat are at last behind y—
It appears his delicate facade has at last shattered.
I will take care of Ai.
Hey, we're doing all this for you!
Everyone, please... I have something to say.
Maybe it's just my mind playing tricks on me.
But I've been watching you all battle for a bit now.
And I think... I'm starting to feel something.
That's great! That means we're on the right track!
Of course I am! I never get to see matchups like these!
All right, this one's pretty much decided already.
At last, it's my turn to take center stage.
Huh. Rulue and Raffina are pretty similar, aren't they?
I've always kind of thought so. They have a lot in common.
They both work hard, and they've got tons of confidence.
If you could refrain from pointless banter going forward, that would be lovely.
Well, go on! Are you gonna dazzle the pants off us or not?
*graceful giggle* You won't have it so easy next time!
That's right. Squares and I were friends.
"I believe in you... Please be my strength..."
Looks like she's trying to sort through her memories.
Think something's about to come back to her?
But why is he like that?
Can't say for sure, but the next hint says...
Why's this one so much more simple than the rest?
Why don't you give it a shot, Tee?
The captain of the SS Tetra and the Tetris King, aren't you?
For someone with a bunch of fancy titles, you're pretty basic.
You should battle Sig! Come on!
I mean, you're always so quiet.
Even when everyone else is jumping around all excited, you stay super calm!
Isn't that because he's always half-asleep?
He looks like he's thinking about something really deep...
All right, we have our contestants lined up!
In this corner, we have the basic—
In this corner, we have the unshakably calm Tee!
And in this corner, we have a turquoise boy who doesn't say a whole lot!
You don't have to force yourself to say anything, Tee.
But we should really be focusing on Marle right now.
Are you doing better now, Marle?
I'm afraid to talk about it.
...But I know it must be said.
About who I am. About who Squares is.
Let's take this slowly and start from the beginning.
As the Will of the Worlds, I watched over the dimensions for ages.
But one day, it manifested itself into a personality—me.
Yes. At first, I was all alone.
Then I saw all of you battling every day... and having fun.
Eventually, the need for someone to talk to got to me.
That's when I used some of my powers...
...my younger brother. Sort of. I created him.
I was so happy once I had Squares with me.
I represented what was "fun" in the worlds I watched over.
I wanted Squares to represent "order" and what was right.
For a long time, Squares was at my side. We were happy.
But soon after, a major event took place.
The merging of worlds isn't exactly an everyday occurrence.
We did our best to keep our actions under the radar.
We stayed in the background and worked to separate the worlds again.
And your memories of the events were completely wiped.
You all desired to see each other again.
Your memories were gone, but your bonds remained strong.
They lived on deep in your hearts and in your subconscious.
When I saw what was happening, I was moved.
I guess there are still some things I don't remember.
That should help me recover my memories.
Yes. I just need help with this last stretch...
I was observing the worlds, trying to understand why they had merged.
I told Squares how "fun" it all seemed and how I wanted to meet you.
That's when he became confused and angry.
As soon as he saw a fitting moment, he robbed me of my powers and memories.
Why did he get so angry?
I entrusted him with defending order in both worlds.
And then I went and did the very opposite.
Yeah! Now let's go over everything real quick.
A mysterious force that watched over the worlds one day became self-aware.
Then you got tired of being all alone.
So you created Squares to keep you company.
You were both happy and watched over the dimensions in peace.
That is, until these two worlds merged together.
But to Squares, this wasn't "right." He refused to let it stand.
That's why he turned on you.
And now he wants to destroy anything that threatens his perfect order.
...Looks like it all came back to you.
Were you aware of all this!?
All I knew for certain was that Marle had a very special power hidden away inside her.
But I never could've imagined what that power would be.
So... you're the Will of the Worlds in the flesh.
Why can't you do anything about Squares?
Can't you use some of your amazing powers!?
...And what exactly is it you're trying to finish?
Wahaha! Sorry to keep you waiting, Ringo!
*princely giggle* I've delivered him to you, as promised.
Ridiculous. I came here of my own accord.
Preparations are nearly complete. I'm putting an end to all this.
I know you're angry, and I'm sorry.
But you don't have to hurt anyone!
Hmph. So, you've got your memories back.
Yeah, thanks to all my friends!
Even still, Marle... You understand NOTHING!
Did you think I'd be defeated so easily? Well, now that you've let your guard down...
...let's see how you fare being erased from existence!
You'll never see this world—or any world—again!
Don't laugh! It's not a touchy subject!
